title: Bloomberg Markets: Galloway on `Hidden DNA' of FANG Companies
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Galloway on `Hidden DNA' of FANG Companies
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Scott Galloway\u0010Professor of Marketing\u0010NYU Stern School of Business\u0010Discussing his book "THE FOUR: The Hidden DNA of Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google" on exactly how these companies built their massive empires.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
